attributes.action: Give all women the right to fertility checks and IVF treatment!
attributes.additional_details: The NHS has made cut backs which stopped all women having this entitlement. The government should ensure that all women have equal rights to have their own child and ensure full checks are carried out and 1 IVF treatment to give them a chance.
attributes.background:
Give all women an equal chance to carry their own child by doing full fertility checks on ALL woman who have been trying for a baby and allow them one attempt of IVF funded by the NHS. 
Do not treat women differently based off whether their partner has a child or not, support should still be there!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require all CCGs in England to offer 3 rounds of IVF: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556941

Fund IVF for everyone in the UK as many times as they wish: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328225
